about.title: About me
about.description1: Front-End Developer since 2020, focusing on modern, responsive, and high-performance interfaces. Advanced knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Vue.js, with experience in TypeScript, Next.js, Angular, and WordPress.
about.description2: Proactive and committed, always seeking to deliver quality and innovation in each project, focusing on the best user experience.

experience.title: Experience
responsibilities: Creator of modern and responsive interfaces
Implement visual and functional improvements in systems and websites
Focus on user experience and high performance
